title: Fix X/Twitter embed overflow in chat messages

requirements.text: Add CSS styling to prevent Twitter/X embed content from overflowing its container in MessageBubble component, ensuring embeds respect their parent container's width constraints

quotes: can you retry the last update

acceptanceCriteria: Twitter/X embeds render within their container boundaries without horizontal overflow
Embeds maintain proper aspect ratio and responsiveness
No layout breaking on mobile or desktop viewports

constraints: Only modify CSS styling for Twitter embeds
Do not change any other functionality in MessageBubble component
nonGoals: Changing how Twitter embeds are loaded or rendered
Modifying other media embed types (YouTube, Twitch, Giphy)
